resources.string: Epic rock music featuring electric guitars, drums, bass and strings
Happy and light music featuring ukulele, finger snapping, pizzicato strings and drums
Jazz music featuring acoustic guitar, double bass, accordion and vibes
Acoustic music with a soft and mellow mood featuring folk guitar and cello
